articles.content: After a number of 13-inch MacBook Pros were found to suffer from screens with wonky backlights, Apple instituted a free repair program that this week has just been extended from four to five years af… [+1926 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk Replies to SpaceX Mars Game Developer After 154 Tweets - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A developer made a video game about SpaceX and life on Mars and sent 154 tweets to Elon Musk asking for the right to use his company's logo and name.
articles.content:
It looks like Elon Musk may have just agreed to allow an independent game developer to use SpaceX's name and logo for the developer's new game: Mars is Flat. 
Lyubomir Vladimirov was not shy and did… [+2253 chars]
